definition: to review a judicial case/to reexamine
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter

sentences.english: Reviewing will not be addressed further in this article.
sentences.chinese: 复审不会在本文中进一步详细说明。

sentences.english: It is recommended that you perform the testability review.
sentences.chinese: 推荐你执行易测性复审。

sentences.english: The evidence was flimsy, and a campaign was launched to secure a re-trial.
sentences.chinese: 由于证据不足，掀起了一场为取得复审的运动。

sentences.english: However, some organizations designate just one or two people to review change requests periodically.
sentences.chinese: 但是，某些企业只指派一两个人来定期复审变更请求。

sentences.english: But the administration that reviews and interprets the resulting data will also incur costs.
sentences.chinese: 但是复审和解释最终数据的管理机构同样需要花钱。

sentences.english: Superior courts may review decisions of lower courts.
sentences.chinese: 高级法院可复审下级法院的判决。

sentences.english: Take proceedings to have reheard in a higher court.
sentences.chinese: 到更高一级法院进行复审。

sentences.english: Chunk up to review and agree the project.
sentences.chinese: 从整体上复审和商定最终的项目。

sentences.english: We proceeded with the examination of the applications for two hours.
sentences.chinese: 专利复审委员会成员曾参与原申请的审查的。

sentences.english: A retrial was necessary after the original trial ended with a hung jury.
sentences.chinese: 由于初审中陪审员裁决意见不一致，所以需要复审。

sentences.english: They will run back over the safety regulations again.
sentences.chinese: 他们将复审一下安全规程。

sentences.english: The court ordered certiorari following judicial review.
sentences.chinese: 在司法复审后，该法院命令调取案卷。

sentences.english: The higher people's court decided to rehear this criminal case.
sentences.chinese: 高级人民法院决定复审这桩刑事案件。

sentences.english: The dossiers of the three promotion applicants will be submitted to the Collegiate Teachers' Evaluation Committee for further evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 将三位升等申请人之资料提送院教评会复审。

sentences.english: Ask customers to do heuristic UI reviews.
sentences.chinese: 要求客户进行启发式的界面复审。

sentences.english: An appeals court ordered a partial retrial for Mr. Riina.
sentences.chinese: 一个上诉庭要求对里伊纳一案进行复审。

definition: to reconsider/to reexamine/to review (e.g. a report prior to accepting it)
to re-investigate/to investigate and reconsider a judgment
to report (to the authorities)/to declare (to customs)
to examine sth and make a decision/to screen/to evaluate/to approve
to accept to hear a case/to handle (a service)
to submit (a report etc)/to refer (a problem) to sb
preliminary hearing/interrogation (of a suspect)/preliminary examination (of a project etc)
